author: Confucius
message: Sincerity is the way of Heaven. The attainment of sincerity is the way of men.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mohandas Gandhi
message: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jim Rohn
message: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oprah Winfrey
message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
title: Thought of the day
